<h3 id="X13901">X(13901)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 3rd TRI-SQUARES-CENTRAL AND MANDART-INCIRCLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (a+b+c)*(-a+b+c)*(2*a^2-(b-c)^2)+4*S*a^2  :  :  <p>X(13901) lies on these lines: {1,8981}, {2,13955}, {3,13905}, {4,13897}, {6,5432}, {11,590}, {12,371}, {33,13884}, {35,7583}, {55,3068}, {56,9540}, {65,13912}, {140,3299}, {485,6284}, {497,8972}, {498,3311}, {615,5326}, {1124,5418}, {1151,7354}, {1317,13913}, {1478,6221}, {1479,8976}, {1587,5217}, {1697,13888}, {1702,11375}, {1836,9616}, {1837,13893}, {2098,13902}, {2646,13883}, {3023,8997}, {3027,8980}, {3028,8994}, {3056,13910}, {3057,8983}, {3058,13846}, {3071,3614}, {3295,13903}, {3316,10591}, {3320,13918}, {3526,13962}, {4294,13886}, {4299,6449}, {4302,13665}, {4995,5414}, {5218,7585}, {5252,9583}, {5434,9663}, {6020,13923}, {6407,9655}, {6417,13963}, {6453,9647}, {6459,10895}, {6564,9660}, {7173,10576}, {7355,8991}, {7582,13954}, {8974,10927}, {8975,10928}, {8987,12680}, {8992,13077}, {8993,13078}, {8995,13079}, {9541,12943}, {9632,10149}, {10799,13885}, {10833,13889}, {10877,13892}, {10947,13895}, {10950,13911}, {10953,13896}, {11909,13894}, {11948,13900}, {12354,13908}, {12428,13909}, {13075,13916}, {13076,13917}, {13081,13921}, {13699,13920}, {13819,13848}</p>
